_meanings:
{@--2@} To
cohabit, have sexual intercourse
with; {#BAryA ca parasaMgatA#} <ls>Pt. 1. 238</ls>;
<ls>Ms. 8. 378.</ls>

{@--3@} To keep company
or intercourse with, associate with.

{@--1@} To bring together, join, unite;
{#vaDUvarO saMgamayAMcakAra#} <ls>R. 7. 20.</ls>

{@--2@} To
endow or present with, unite with,
bestow on, give to; {#priyasuhfdi#} 
{#biBIzaRe saMgamayya SriyaM vEriRaH#} <ls>R. 12. 104.</ls>
